drug.name: Eptacog alfa pegol (activated)
drug.description: Eptacog alfa pegol (activated) has been used in trials studying the prevention and treatment of Haemophilia A, Haemophilia B, Congenital Bleeding Disorder, Haemophilia B With Inhibitors, and Haemophilia A With Inhibitors.

synonyms.synonym: Activated Recombinant Human Factor VII, Long Acting

drug-interaction.name: Peginterferon alfa-2a
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Eptacog alfa pegol (activated) can be decreased when used in combination with Peginterferon alfa-2a.
